code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import texto_es from'./textos/textosEsp.json';import texto_en from'./textos/textosEng.json';import emailjs from'emailjs-com';import'./Form.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const ContactForm=_ref=>{let{idioma}=_ref;const form=useRef(null);const textos=idioma==='es'?texto_es:texto_en;const sendEmail=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await emailjs.sendForm('service_px05c85','template_sp9hjsp',form.current,'jV-YA7TFp6uQ-Yvqp');console.log('Correo electr贸nico enviado exitosamente!');}catch(error){console.error('Error al enviar el correo electr贸nico:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{ref:form,onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"to_name",children:textos.Contacto.nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"to_name",id:"to_name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"from_name",children:textos.Contacto.Email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"from_name",id:"from_name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"message",children:textos.Contacto.Mensaje}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",id:"message",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Send"})]});};
